Name: A Penny For Some Motivation
About the game: Whether you are feeling down & depressed, or full of life & inspired, everybody needs a little motivation from time to time. This game offers just that. This game plays out as a platformer that simplifies most of real life situations in 30 levels. This either serves to help you move forward from or simply reminds you the existence of such situations. Simple and easy. The only real requirement to complete this game, is a bit of willpower which can be trained. And with willpower, it is possible to tackle everything else.
